content:
What a wonderful trip you're planning! Coastal state parks are always a treat, and spotting ospreys and bald eagles can be a thrilling experience. I'd be happy to help you with that.

To provide you with the most accurate information, could you please tell me which coastal state park you're planning to visit? Different parks have varying habitats and populations of these birds, so knowing the specific location will help me give you more tailored advice.

Additionally, are you planning to visit during a specific time of year or season? Ospreys and bald eagles have different migration patterns and breeding seasons, which can affect their presence in certain areas.

Once I have this information, I can provide you with tips on the best spots to see these magnificent birds, as well as any other helpful information about the park's trails, viewing areas, and guidelines for responsible wildlife viewing.
